subject: RE: Making Ant exec task failonerror if invoked suite has failures

Wayne Van Nice wrote:
> Are you executing the <fail> tag?

I believe this only applies if you use one of the Junit ant tasks.  I 
use an EXEC tag, which does not set any failure property that I know of.

Thanks,
Chad
